title: COVID Coach
description:
The world as we know it has changed and we are living in unprecedented and uncertain times. COVID Coach is designed to help you build resilience, manage stress, and increase your well-being during this crisis. The app is free, secure, and helps connect you to important resources for coping and adapting during the COVID-19 pandemic. Customized tools are available to help you cope with stress, stay well, stay safe, stay healthy, stay connected, and navigate parenting, care-giving, and working from home while social distancing, quarantined, or sheltered in place. You can track your mood, visualize your progress, and find resources to seek additional help and support. No account or password is required and user data is not collected.

COVID Coach was made by the mobile mental health team of the National Center for PTSD, Dissemination & Training Division.

recentChanges:
* Added a Learn topic about vaccines
* Fixed a couple of bugs with Spanish translations
* Some new animals are getting some sun, and it's starting to strain plausibility
recentChangesHTML:
* Added a Learn topic about vaccines
* Fixed a couple of bugs with Spanish translations
* Some new animals are getting some sun, and it's starting to strain plausibility
comments: A great app with a wide range of useful tools for coping with stress, Covid Coach offers practices, learning, resources and assessments based on sound psychological science. There is an ability to favorite your favorite practices for quick use and the interface is simple and easy to use. Functions well and haven't had any glitches. I have only been using a short time, but the notifications and engagement have been useful.

I don't know why I resisted using an emotional support app but I did. Originally I downloaded this Covid Coach to evaluate it before recommending it to tech preference friends. Now utilizing this app for myself is supportive in ways that surprise me. It reminds me to USE the tools I have which allows me to have more choice in my days & nights. This ultimately allows me to have a life more of my choosing. By acknowledging where I'm at with my scheduled check-ins I choose what to do from there.

Helpful resources on any app capable mobile phone is an excellent app that is at no cost to anyone! Typically an app like this charges a subscription fee but this one doesn't. Thank you very much for this!
Highly recommend it. I worked in a very demanding environment where there wasn't enough support. Using this coupled with professional help maximize the experience.
Used to monitor well being over a period of 6 months. I found it very useful for a personal check in using the surveys weekly.
Just ran thru available topics and am pleasantly surprised. Shame you need to give access to phone files etc. DEVELOPERS: The "goals" page appears in Spanish in the English version.
This is a very professional and easy to use app w with useful applications for a range of people. I'm a counselor and educator and I recommend this app for personal and client use.
So much good content! A few pages show up in Spanish, even though I've chosen English. But great job putting this together 👍🏼
Very helpful. Easy to explore and use. A lot available to spend time on.
Very useful. The easy to use tracking features are what I needed most.
I just got this today but, so far I am liking it. It has multiple different things you can use to help you manage stress, anxiety, and depression.
Nice app. Helps me to manage my stress and anxiety.
Excellent Resources and Service.
Is a good app and allows me to regain focus whenever needed.
Most military apps are really bad but this one feels like something you would spend money on.
Great very helpful and easy to use
Very excited to use this app more! Thank you to the creators for these tools, your time and diligence to create an app that is easy to use and seems to pull you right out of a hard place.
Refer pts to it all the time. Great resource
It is a fast and easy app to work through. The app helps me focus on the right things in life.
Great ideas for combating stress.
Great app. Lots of information to learn about your mental health.
Very, very good, for self and family💘
Requires access to your photos and files just to open the app. No thanks.
Can't see how it is useful for COVID. Name is missleading.
Very helpful and informative
Some times when things are hard i need a reminder/ nudge to take a step back from the situation. short messages and practices.are just the thing for getting back on the track of mindfulness.

This app is terrific. I've tried several other wellness or meditation apps, and this one is out of the park in its offerings. Plus the narrator voices are calming. There's an outstanding number of exercises for various approaches, and all I've tried were helpful. Well done!

I was excited for this app. Unfortunately this app REQUIRES access to your phone. After downloading, a prompt will say: "Allow Covid Coach to access photos, media, and files on your device?" As soon as I tap on "deny" the app automatically closes and locks me out of the service. How is this supposed to be helping me? You don't need access to my phone. I'm disappointed.
My counselor suggested this to me, so I'm trying it out. She'll be happy I'm doing this.
This is amazing. It has all you may need. Mood trackers, resources, meditation. Not too frilly, just important
It is similar to other self help. Easy to use. Makes one think. Asks one questions. Offers advice. Keeps tracks of goals. It all come down to how much energy and honesty one puts into it.
Easy to use.
Well designed and useful. Made for vets with PTSD but can work for anybody with stress, anxiety, or depression. Well designed and thought out.
Lots of resources. I love that you can save your favorites for easy access. The in app exercises are a life savers for when anxiety takes over
A great resource during a difficult time. Especially love the daily messages and "mood music".
There should be no reason this app needs media, phone and Gallery permissions just to launch. Especially when it prompts you that you can disable them later.
Amazing app! And best part is that it's completely free with no strings attached or any data-mining to worry about.
I'm not done exploring it yet but so far it's user friendly
A very comprehensive tool with many options available. Will refer clients to this, very helpful.
This app has a wide variety of assistance for people and vets going through a difficult time with dealing with the current epidemic.
